content: Revenue in Africa and Asia in 2022 grew by 259% year-over-year, reaching $74 million in 2022 with significant opportunities ahead of us. In Q4, revenues increased by 5x year-over-year and grew 4% quarter-over-quarter reaching $26 million. We experienced higher than expected growth in Nigeria, which already accounts for 12% and 8% of our revenues in Q4 and full-year 2022, respectively. Moving on to Latin America, we continue to see solid growth across the region in 2022 with revenue growing by 54% year-over-year to $345 million in 2022. Going into more detail, in Q4 2022, revenue grew by 30% year-over-year and by 6% quarter-over-quarter to $93 million. In Q4 2022, we saw strong growth in our TPV, reaching $3.3 billion, up by 78% year-over-year and a strong 21% quarter-over-quarter. Following the trends seen in Q3, in Q4, we also experienced high growth in local-to-local TPV, increasing by 125% year-over-year and   quarter-over-quarter, due to the strong performance of some of our merchants. During 2022 of the 72% year-over-year revenue growth, 65% of $158 million came from existing merchants. For Q4 2022, of the 55% year-over-year revenue growth, 46% or $35 million came from existing merchants and 9% or $7 million came from new merchants. In Q4, our gross profit reached $55 million, up 42% year-over-year and 2% quarter-over-quarter. Excluding these expenses that we believe are non-recurring in nature, net income would have been $116 million in 2022, an increase of 49% year-over-year and 27 million in Q4 2022. Your line is now open. One moment for our next question. Your line is now open. One moment for our next question. Your line is now open. One moment for our next question. Your line is now open.
